blogs.title: Gemini Glory
blogs.body:
The moon spirit, most powerful of all realms can only be summoned by he who is of Gemini Blood.
 Welcome to Humanis, A world with balance controlled by six energy realms until the invasion of an ancient dark realm
blogs.author: Harry Obi
